attributes.action: Bring down the price of gym memberships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All gyms make a huge profit from joining fees ( which having worked in gyms for many years i know they do not exsist just extra revenue) on top they charge very high fees, surely if they cut out the joining fee and reduce their fees more people would join improve their health and well being, great news for employers , less days of ill, lively members of staff, better performance, better results in the work place, help the nation get fit!! Request they reduce the cost!! Reduce the risks of morbid obesity in years to come!! Reduce the the amount of people requiring treatment on the NHS!!  Show you care!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
